mapper.sql: goodsCategory.id as id , goodsCategory.category_id as categoryId , goodsCategory.category_name as categoryName , goodsCategory.parent_id as parentId , goodsCategory.category_type as categoryType , goodsCategory.category_level as categoryLevel , goodsCategory.input_tax as inputTax , goodsCategory.output_tax as outputTax , goodsCategory.consume_tax as consumeTax , goodsCategory.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , goodsCategory.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , goodsCategory.order_number as orderNumber , goodsCategory.status as status , goodsCategory.is_delete as isDelete , goodsCategory.creator_id as creatorId , goodsCategory.creator as creator , goodsCategory.create_time as createTime , goodsCategory.updator_id as updatorId , goodsCategory.updator as updator , goodsCategory.update_time as updateTime , goodsCategory.remark1 as remark1 , goodsCategory.remark2 as remark2
mapper.insert:
insert into goods_category_tb
id,
category_id,
category_name,
parent_id,
category_type,
category_level,
input_tax,
output_tax,
consume_tax,
hierarchy_id,
directly_org_id,
order_number,
status,
is_delete,
creator_id,
creator,
create_time,
updator_id,
updator,
update_time,
remark1,
remark2,
#{id},
#{categoryId},
#{categoryName},
#{parentId},
#{categoryType},
#{categoryLevel},
#{inputTax},
#{outputTax},

mapper.update:
update goods_category_tb
category_id = #{categoryId},
category_name = #{categoryName},
parent_id = #{parentId},
category_type = #{categoryType},
category_level = #{categoryLevel},
input_tax = #{inputTax},
output_tax = #{outputTax},
consume_tax = #{consumeTax},
hierarchy_id = #{hierarchyId},
directly_org_id = #{directlyOrgId},
order_number = #{orderNumber},
status = #{status},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT goodsCategory.category_name categoryName, pGoodsCategory.category_name pCategoryName, goodsCategory.id id, goodsCategory.parent_id parentId, goodsCategory.category_level categoryLevel, goodsCategory.create_time createTime, goodsCategory.update_time updateTime FROM goods_category_tb goodsCategory LEFT JOIN goods_category_tb pGoodsCategory ON goodsCategory.parent_id = pGoodsCategory.id where 1=1 ORDER BY goodsCategory.create_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM goods_category_tb goodsCategory LEFT JOIN goods_category_tb pGoodsCategory ON goodsCategory.parent_id = pGoodsCategory.id where 1=1
